title: Zero Bribery Incidence
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Cyprus reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, showcasing the country's strong stance against corruption.

title: Exceptional Female Education Persistence
description: By 2021, Cyprus achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching grade 5 and the last grade of primary education, highlighting the country's commitment to female education.

title: Minimal Poverty Levels
description: In 2021, only 0.1% of Cyprus's population lived below the poverty line of $8.30 a day, indicating a strong economic standing and effective poverty alleviation measures.
